    Storyboard Script Library

    A library of 4 scripts for use with Storybrew

    Contribute

    Recent Releases

    Remove Background

    Background
    Script

    Hides the beatmap background in the storyboard.

    EZ Lyrics

    Text
    Configurable

    A very easy to use Lyrics script. Plug and play, configure inside Storybrew. Requires a timed .ass file

    BG Parallax

    Background
    Script

    Moves the background in the opposite direction of player cursor. As seen in Chata - enn.

    Advanced Leaves

    Particles
    Script

    Blowing leaves effect with per object rotation.
